readable.title: 2533424347_cf2f84872b
readable.content: A race car blows smoke while it drives . A race car drives on a track while several people watch from behind rope . A race car screeches through a turn as spectators watch . A sponsored race car is spinning its tires on a track while being watched by spectators . Onlookers watch a white stock car that has smoke coming out of the back .
